reviewText: While he introduces a lot of the helpful hints to do a good job, he doesn't go into detail about enough of the hints.  He talks about using a wood file to shave off the ends, but goes through it too fast.  It should have been twice as long with more detail.  He says to get caulk, but never tells of how to use it.  I didn't think it was comprehensive.

I bought this DVD directly from [...] and it is awesome. I could never have done as good of a job on the crown molding in our dining room if I hadn't gotten this DVD. The instructions are great for a do-it-yourselfer.
Tim tells you everything you need to know.
